Weather Briefing

Documentation

Forecast Models¶

A variety of model forecast websites. Note that only a few of these websites focus on Canada, it is often a necessary compromise to use a broad domain to forecast for Canada.

Windy¶

https://www.windy.com/-Menu/menu?500h,54.835,-103.298,3,i:gh,m:eZyaeym One of the more unique forecast pages. A variety of weather variables that can be adjusted for height. Users can also add plugins, the most useful of which is the is the MeteoBlue plugin. These are some of the best meteograms available.

BlueSky - Smoke¶

https://firesmoke.ca/ Access surface smoke modeling as well as an FWI forecast. Additionally, BlueSky Playground is available to run different emissions scenarios for prescribed fires.
